basics.name: Manohar Kodela
basics.label: Experienced Vice President with a demonstrated history of working in the textiles industry. Skilled in Textile Industry, General Operations, Dyeing, Textiles, and Spinning. Strong professional with a Master of Business Administration (M.B.A.) focused in Marketing/Marketing Management, General from IGNOU.
